name: MedicinalProductPharmaceutical.routeOfAdministration.maxSingleDose
title: MedicinalProductPharmaceutical.routeOfAdministration.maxSingleDose
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: The maximum single dose that can be administered as per the protocol of a clinical trial can be specified using a numerical value and its unit of measurement
element.definition: The maximum single dose that can be administered as per the protocol of a clinical trial can be specified using a numerical value and its unit of measurement.
